SustainabilityTaskGroup.name: SustainabilityTaskGroup
SustainabilityTaskGroup.description: Represents the group of sustainability tasks.

Description.description: The description of the sustainability task group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Location.description: The location of the sustainability tasks in the sustainability task group. The location can include a city, county, state, province, country, or region.

Name.description: The name of the sustainability task group.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the data collection, report review, or other sustainability activities being tracked.

PeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the data collection, report review, or other sustainability activities being tracked.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the sustainability task group.

TaskDueDate.description: The date when the stakeholder must complete the sustainability tasks.

Type.description: Specifies the type of sustainability activity being tracked in the sustainability task group.
